timeline.bodyText: Why implement this as a seperate free-standing function and not as part of the class it's comparing?
timeline.author: fooker

replies.bodyText: Hm good question. The method was also not used anymore. I guess some leftover from refactoring... I ended up deleting the whole class :-)
replies.author: patrick-schweizer
